Video: 4 
Virtually unwatchable.  Often extremely blurry.  Facial expressions imperceptible.  Dark scenes nearly impossible to comprehend.
At 00:33:40, the camera rotates off to the left, pulling the viewer out from the movie.
Color faded

Audio: 7
Acceptable.  Low volume difficult to hear at times but with VLC's ability to raise volume past 100%, or by using headphones, volume is fine.  
Sometimes slightly clicky.

Movie: Exciting.
